newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle trade actively at $66 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle trade actively at $66 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was active in the panhandle area Tuesday. Slaughter steers and heifers were $2.00 higher, USDA said. Feedlots reporting good inquiry from buyers. Sales reported on 38,900 slaughter steers and 27,700 heifers; 97,500 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 32,300 formulated and 1,100 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Slaughter Steers Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 66.00; Carcass Basis 105.00-105.50.
Slaughter Heifers Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs 66.00; Carcass Basis 105.00-105.50.
Note all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Confirmed: 63,600 Last Week: None Year Ago: None
Wk to Date: 97,500 Last Week: 49,900 Year Ago: 36,400
